structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY EMPLOYEES' CIVIL SERVICE AND RETIREMENT

law.catch_line: County judge/executive to certify information concerning personnel.

text.section: Within ten (10) days after the creation of any board under KRS 78.400 to 78.460, the county judge/executive shall certify to the board the names, rank, rate of pay, the seniority of every officer and employee on the police force as of the effective date of the fiscal court order creating the board.
If there is a board in existence June 14, 1962, the county judge/executive shall within thirty (30) days certify the chief and assistant chief to the board.

law.history: Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 4. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 3.
